# f5distributedcloud_k8s_cluster_role_binding (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_k8s_cluster_role_binding` resource manages Kubernetes Cluster Role Bindings in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Kubernetes Cluster Role Bindings bind cluster roles to users or service accounts.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_k8s_cluster_role_binding" "example" {
  name        = "my-cluster-role-binding"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Binding admin role to service account"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
